You have been taking a walk in the woods around your house. In all the years you've lived outside of civilization, you haven't been bored with the scenery yet. However, it's late, and you are getting tired. You've been retracing your path back to your house, but you're still about 15 minutes away.

Suddenly, you start to hear sounds above the treetops. You can't place it, but they sound similar to wingbeats. But that's crazy, there's nothing that large in the region, let alone anything that flies. But now you're curious and look up.

At first, there are too many branches in the way for you to see through. But soon, you see something shimmering above the treetops. And it starts to decend...

It slips between the high boughs, shifting it's wings and acing it's course at just the right angles to where almost nothing touches it on it's way down. Soon it breaks into the path in front of you and dives down. As it approaches the ground it folds up it's wings to land gracefully a few meters in front of you.

I am pleased to finally reach you. A femenine voice says, though you can't tell exactly how it is being produced. But by now you've figued out what you've just met: a silver Dragon.
